subject: Dear Sr/ Ma,
body:
Dear Sr/ Ma,
My name is Joseph Cole, Director of Operation at CRYPTO DREAM.
Some of my colleagues in other Blockchain Companies like; TETHER
(USDT), Bitcoin (BTC) etc, asked me to look for a trustworthy person
who has the capability to receive crypto currency that runs into
millions of dollars when exchanged.
They have many wallets whose owners can no longer be reached or
identified, some have died in the on-going Russian/Ukrainian war, by
accidents or even natural disasters, without any next of kin in their
mandates with the Companies.
If you can work with us, you will be entitled to 25% of whatever
amount we move out per time.
This deal can be concluded in a week with your cooperation.
Revert very quickly if you think you are that person we are to work with.
Best Regards.
Joseph Cole.
Email:josephcolecryptodream@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Dear Sr/ Ma,
body:
Dear Joseph Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the opportunity you have presented regarding receiving cryptocurrency. I'm interested in learning more about this opportunity.

Could you please provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I would like to know how the funds are obtained and what my role would be in this process. Additionally, it would be helpful to understand the potential risks involved and any legal considerations.

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Re: Dear Sr/ Ma,
body:
Dear Mr Jack,
Thanks for writing back. This business is an opportunity that I believe
that providence has brought our way and we must quickly take advantage of
it. If you give us your full cooperation, we can consummate the deal within
a week. To proceed, please provide us with your receiving crypto WALLET
address, a copy of your ID and your WhatsApp number, to execute the
transfer.
As the transaction is progressing, I will be updating you.
Awaiting your quick reply.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director.

subject: Re: Dear Sr/ Ma,
body:
Dear Mr Joseph Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your enthusiasm about this business opportunity. However, before we proceed, I have a few questions that I would like to clarify.

1. Could you please provide more details about the nature of this business opportunity? What exactly is it that we will be doing?

2. How does the transfer process work? Can you explain it in more detail?

3. Is there any financial investment required from my end? If so, what is the amount and how will it be utilized?

I look forward to your response and gaining a better understanding of this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Draft MoU.
body:
Dear Mr Jack

Okay, please review the attached MoU and let us know your thoughts before
we proceed.

Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Re: Draft MoU.
body:
Dear Mr Joseph Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information with me. Could you please provide me with some more details about the attachment you mentioned? What is it about and how does it relate to our conversation?

I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Re: Draft MoU.
body:
Dear Mr Jack,
I am sorry for late response.
The attachment is a draft MoU which is all we need as a guide to the
business as parties.
Please carefully view the (MoU) Memorandum of understanding and sign it and
forward it to me along with other required details to proceed.
I wait to hear from you.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Re: Draft MoU.
body:
Dear Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your patience and apologize for the delay in my response. I hope you are doing well.

I received the draft attachment you mentioned, but I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding. Could you please provide more information about the Memorandum of? What is its purpose and how does it relate to the business we will be involved in?

Additionally, could you kindly explain what other required details you need from me? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of what is expected so that I can provide the necessary information promptly.

Thank you again for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Re: Draft MoU.
body:
Dear Mr Jack,
Thank for your prompt response, I am convinced that with this and other
things yet to be observed, you must be a sincere and honest person I have
been looking for.
Once again thank you for your cooperation.
The content of the MoU is clear and very easy to understand, must
importantly is to ensure that You and I are in agreement with the terms and
conditions to ensure that this business is concluded in a timely manner and
good atmosphere, which includes the shareing percentage 60/40 upon the
immediately release of the two Tether wallets into your own BTC wallet of
your nominated bank account as you so desire.

And should there be any reason to invest in the course of the transaction,
we should also bear the cost at 60/40.

To proceed, you are expected to provide your personal details which
includes your full names, your current residence address, a copy of your
any Government approved ID, and a cellphone number for easy communication.
I wait to read from you.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Re: Draft MoU.
body:
Dear Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your kind words and assurance of sincerity and honesty. I am definitely interested in learning more about this business opportunity.

Could you please provide me with some additional details about the terms and conditions? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of what is expected from both parties involved.

Also, could you explain further how the sharing percentage works upon the release of the two Tether wallets into my BTC wallet? I want to make sure I fully comprehend the process before moving forward.

Regarding the investment costs, what kind of expenses might arise during the course of this business? It would be good to know upfront so that we can plan accordingly.

Lastly, for security purposes, could you please explain why you require my personal details such as full names, current residence address, copy of a government-approved ID, and cellphone number? I just want to ensure that my information will be handled securely.

Thank you once again for reaching out to me. I look forward to hearing back from you soon with more information.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: What you need to know.
body:
Dear Mr Jack,
I am in receipt of your email and all content well noted.
In response to your mail, the terms and conditions here is clearly stated
for your perusal.
1. Which is the sharing percentage of 60% for me and 40% for you which will
take effect immediately upon the receipt confirmation of the value of the
two Tether Wallets into your BTC wallet.

2.Upon confirmation of the fund in your BTC, on or before 24hours the
disbursement of the funds shall be made by you as the final beneficiary
approved by the court through the issues of Affidavit of Trust and Claim in
your name.

3. About the investment cost, I am sure this will be minimal which might be
required by the court to execute the transfer of Ownership to reflect your
name as the next-of-kine and final beneficiary of the two Tether Wallets.
This cost shall be shared by both parties same as 60/40% and that is only
once.

Finally the security purposes, I can assure you 100% that all your personal
details must be secured in my safe hand as I also assure you that this
transition is 100% risk free and must be completed in a record time.
Further more your personal details are only required by our legal
department to be summited and presented to the court to execute the
transfer of Ownership to reflect your name as the next-of-kine and final
beneficiary of the two available Tether Wallets.

I am sure these has explained your questions and please you are expected to
forward those required details now to enable me forward it to our legal
department to proceed with their assignment to procure the legal needed
documents in your name as the next-of-kine and final beneficiary of the two
Tether wallets.
Thank you for your cooperation as I wait to hear from you today.

Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Update.
body:
I will be waiting to read back from you with your info.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations

subject: Re: Update.
body:
Hello Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information. Could you please provide me with more details about what kind of information you would like to share? I'm curious to know more.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Re: Update.
body:
Dear Mr Jack,
Sir,
Your prompt response is highly appreciated.
To proceed, you are expected to forward your full name and current
residence address, a copy of your passport or any Government approved ID,
and your current cell phone number for easy communication.
Once I get all this information I will forward it to the company legal
department to proceed immediately in your name.
I wait to read back from you with the info to avoid further delay.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Update.
body:
Dear Mr Jack,
Sir,
I got your response but no information was found in the mail.
Please resend the details  to avoid further delay.
I am waiting to hear back from you.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Re: Draft MoU.
body:
Dear Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your kind words and assurance of sincerity and honesty. I am definitely interested in learning more about this business opportunity.

Could you please provide me with some additional details about the terms and conditions? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of what is expected from both parties involved.

Also, could you explain further about the release of the two Tether wallets into my BTC wallet? How does that process work exactly?

Lastly, I understand that there might be some costs involved in the course of this investment. Could you please elaborate on what those costs might be and how they will be handled?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Explanation.
body:
Dear Mr Jack,
Sir,
The questions you are asking have been explained to you in the previous
email I sent to you.
 Please go through the previous email I sent to you, the answers to all you
need to know have been preview to you.

About the Two Tether wallets available, it will be transferred to your Own
BTC Wallet immediately an affidavit of trust and claim is swarn in Court in
your name as the next-of-kine and final beneficiary of the funds.
This means that the legal department will execute transfer of ownership to
reflect your name as the next-of-kine and final beneficiary of the fund.

About the cost and Investment in the business, it's only once which is
minimal and must be shared among the two parties, it will be 60% and 40%
respectively only upon demand by the legal department as the Court may dim
it feet.
I will keep you update as the business progress.
Please for your details to enable me proceed with the process.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Re: Draft MoU.
body:
Dear Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your kind words and assurance of sincerity and honesty. I am definitely interested in learning more about this business opportunity.

Could you please provide me with some additional details about the terms and conditions? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of what is expected from both parties involved.

Also, could you explain further how the sharing percentage works upon the release of the two Tether wallets into my BTC wallet? I want to make sure I fully comprehend the process before moving forward.

Regarding the investment costs, what kind of expenses might arise during the course of this business? It would be good to know upfront so that we can plan accordingly.

Lastly, for security purposes, could you please explain why you require my personal details such as full names, current residence address, copy of a government-approved ID, and cellphone number? I just want to ensure that my information will be handled securely.

Thank you once again for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Re: Explanation.
body:
Dear Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for your response. I apologize if I missed any information in the previous email. Could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. In the previous email, you mentioned two Tether wallets. Could you explain what these wallets are used for and how they are connected to the affidavit of trust and claim in court?

2. You mentioned that there is a cost and investment involved in the business. Could you provide more details about this? What is the purpose of this cost and how much is it?

3. How will I be kept updated on the progress of the business? Will there be regular communication or specific milestones that will be shared with me?

I appreciate your assistance in providing these clarifications.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Info.
body:
Mr Jack,
Sir,
Unfortunately I have explained to you and answered all the questions you
are asking.
With due respect, please visit the previous email and get back to me with
your information as soon as possible.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Re: Info.
body:
Dear Mr Joseph Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if I have missed any previous emails or questions you may have answered. Could you please provide me with a brief summary of the information you would like to share? I am interested in learning more and would be happy to discuss further.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Re: Info.
body:
Mr Jack,
Sir
The information we need to process are as follows.
Your full name, current residence address. A copy of your passport or
driver's license, and your cellphone number.
Once I get these details we proceed.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Re: Info.
body:
Dear Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in processing whatever it is that you mentioned. However, before I provide any personal information, could you please clarify what exactly this process is for? I want to make sure I understand the purpose and ensure that it aligns with my needs.

Additionally, could you please provide more details about your organization or company? It would be helpful to know who I am dealing with and what your role is within the organization.

Thank you again for your time and cooperation.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Re: Update.
body:
Dear Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response and willingness to provide further information. However, before I proceed, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. Could you please clarify what this opportunity is about? I would like to have a better understanding of the purpose and benefits involved.

2. What company are you representing? It would be helpful to know more about the organization and its background.

3. Is there any specific reason why you require my full name, current residence address, copy of my passport or ID, and cell phone number? How will this information be used?

I look forward to hearing back from you with the requested information so that we can continue our conversation.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Re: Update.
body:
Dear Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if there was any issue with the previous email. I appreciate your prompt response.

To clarify, I am contacting you today to share some exciting information about a unique investment opportunity that has recently come across my desk. It involves a cutting-edge technology company that is poised for significant growth in the coming years.

This company has developed a revolutionary product that has the potential to disrupt an entire industry. With their innovative approach and strong leadership team, they are well-positioned to capture a substantial market share.

I understand that you may have some questions or concerns, and I would be more than happy to address them for you. Could you please let me know what specific details you would like me to resend? Additionally, feel free to ask any follow-up questions or request further information about this opportunity.

Looking forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: Re: What you need to know.
body:
Dear Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the detailed information you have provided regarding the terms and conditions of this transaction. It is good to know that the sharing percentage will be determined upon receipt of the funds into my BTC wallet.

Regarding the investment cost, you mentioned that it will be minimal and required by the court to execute the transfer of ownership. Could you please provide more details about this cost? I would like to understand what it entails before proceeding further.

You mentioned that all my personal details will be secured in your safe hands. That is reassuring to hear, as security is definitely a concern for me. Can you please explain how my personal details will be used by your legal department and why they are necessary for the transfer of ownership?

I want to ensure that everything is done legally and without any risks involved. Can you please provide more information about the legal process and how long it usually takes to complete such transactions?

Thank you once again for your assistance, Mr. Cole. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jack

subject: I am waiting for your info?
body:
Dear Mr Jack,
Sir,
All the questions you are asking have been answered in my previous mail to
you.
In summary.
The shareing percentage as you already know is 60% for me and 40% for you
which will be disburse by you upon Confirmation receipt of the fund into
your BTC wallet.

The cost to execute the transfer of ownership to reflect your name as the
next-of-kine and final beneficiary will be determine by court and not me.

Your details shall be summited and presented to the court to execute an
Affidavit transfer of ownership to reflect your name as the next-of-kine
and final beneficiary of the fund.

I can assure you that if you give me your cooperation this business can be
comsumate on or before 5 days.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation in this matter.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Re: I am waiting for your info?
body:
Dear Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for your response. I apologize if I missed any information in your previous email. I appreciate your patience in explaining it to me again.

Regarding the sharing percentage, could you please clarify what the specific percentages are for both of us? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of how the funds will be divided.

You mentioned that the cost to execute the transfer of ownership will be determined by the court. Could you provide more details on what this cost entails? I want to make sure I have a complete picture of all the expenses involved.

Additionally, could you explain how my details will be submitted and presented to the court for the execution of an Affidavit transfer of ownership? What documents or information will be required from me?

I am interested in moving forward with this business opportunity, but I would like to gather as much information as possible before making any decisions. Thank you for your assistance and cooperation.

Best wishes,
Jack
